body: A spell takes up one page of the spellbook per spell level. Even a 0-level spell (cantrip) takes one page. A spellbook has 100 pages.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Arcane Spells/Arcane Magical Writings/Writing a New Spell into a Spellbook/Space in the Spellbook
name: Space in the Spellbook
